Package allurium.aspects

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractInputElementAspects  
    CarouselAspects
    Aspect class for enhancing interactions with carousel components using AbstractCarousel.
    CheckBoxAspects
    Aspect for enhancing methods in CheckBox with additional behaviors such as step logging.
    DropdownAspects  
    FormAspects
    Aspect class for intercepting and logging actions performed on AbstractForm instances.
    IframeAspects  
    ImageAspects
    Aspect for intercepting methods in the Image class to enhance Allure reporting.
    LinkAspects
    Aspect for enhancing the behavior of the Link class by adding Allure reporting capabilities.
    PageAspects  
    RequiredTextFieldAspects  
    SelectAspects
    Aspect class for handling additional behavior and logging for the Select class.
    SliderAspects  
    SwitcherAspects
    Aspect class for intercepting and logging actions performed on AbstractSwitcher with additional behaviors.
    TextFieldAspects
    Aspect for enhancing the behavior of the TextField class by adding Allure reporting capabilities.
    UIElementAspects
    This class provides Aspect-Oriented Programming (AOP) enhancements for the UIElement class.
    UploadFileInputAspects
    Aspect for adding Allure reporting capabilities to the UploadField class.
    WidgetAspects  
    WidgetListAspects
